message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $110.  It's really a great product and worth every penny.
I'm still interested, but I'm not sure if I can go up to $110. Can you meet me at $95?
